blogPost.excerpt: With DesignTern we give you a platform to explore a list of Design Internships openings from the biggest companies around the world. You can also use DesignTern to post your own Design Internship opening for your company.
blogPost.body: With DesignTern we give you a platform to explore a list of Design Internships openings from the biggest companies around the world. You can also use DesignTern to post your own Design Internship opening for your company.
blogPost.title: DesignTern - Easily Explore & Apply to Design Internships
blogPost.author: AJ Picard

localize.description: 通过DesignTern，我们为您提供了一个平台，让您探索全球最大公司的设计实习机会列表。你也可以使用DesignTern来发布你自己的公司的设计实习机会。
localize.tagline: 轻松探索和申请设计实习机会

localize.description: 通過DesignTern，我們爲您提供了一個平臺，讓您探索全球最大公司的設計實習機會列表。你也可以使用DesignTern來發布你自己的公司的設計實習機會。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆探索和申請設計實習機會

previous.excerpt: Use the tools you know. Respect users' privacy. Forget cookie consents. Comply with GDPR, ePrivacy, COPPA, CalOPPA, PECR, PIPEDA, CASL; you name it.
previous.title: Privera - Privacy-first, ethical and cookieless Google Analytics

localize.description: 使用你知道的工具。尊重用户的隐私。忘掉cookie同意。遵守GDPR、ePrivacy、COPPA、CalOPPA、PECR、PIPEDA、CASL等标准。
localize.tagline: 隐私优先，道德和无熟人的谷歌分析。

localize.description: 使用你知道的工具。尊重用戶的隱私。忘掉cookie同意。遵守GDPR、ePrivacy、COPPA、CalOPPA、PECR、PIPEDA、CASL等標準。
localize.tagline: 隱私優先，道德和無熟人的谷歌分析。

next.excerpt: Helps translate phrases, words, and idioms in context with examples in English, Russian, German, French, Spanish, Italian. Learn languages more effectively with phrases translated into the context of sentences.

localize.description: 帮助翻译短语、单词和成语，并提供英语、俄语、德语、法语、西班牙语和意大利语的例子。通过将短语翻译成句子的上下文，更有效地学习语言。
localize.tagline: 在上下文中翻译句子、词语、成语，并举例说明。

localize.description: 幫助翻譯短語、單詞和成語，並提供英語、俄語、德語、法語、西班牙語和意大利語的例子。通過將短語翻譯成句子的上下文，更有效地學習語言。
localize.tagline: 在上下文中翻譯句子、詞語、成語，並舉例說明。
